Literature.Title: High-level biosynthesis of the anteiso-C(17) isoform of the antibiotic mycosubtilin in Bacillus subtilis and characterization of its candidacidal activity.
Literature.Author: Fickers P, Guez JS, Damblon C, Leclère V, Béchet M, Jacques P, Joris B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=4µg/ml),Yarrowia lipolytica CBS 6303(MIC=8µg/ml),Pichia pastoris(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans HEM 3742(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis IHEM 9557(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida tropicalis IHEM 6246(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida guilliermondii IHEM 1067(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida glabrata IHEM 6161(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida glabrata L999(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida glabrata S53452(MIC=150µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans IHEM 3969(MIC=8µg/ml),Aspergillus parasiticus IHEM 4383(MIC=>300µg/ml),Aspergillus terreus IHEM 2499 (MIC=>300µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus IHEM 3562(MIC=>300µg/ml)
